question: 2000 ni ko 2002 nî kan, 'chhiat-su kòe lâi pò-kò' ê chêng-sū ūi-cháiⁿ chhin-chhin?
answer: Chhiat-su kòe lâi pò-kò' ê chêng-sū sī tī saⁿ-tang ê sî-kan lâi thiah-koaⁿ khah khoài. Siông-sit tùi 2000 nî ê $194,628 lâi kòe kah 2001 nî ê $450,094 koh-chài nn̄g pèi-chiah kah 2002 nî ê $1,141,879 lâi koh-chài nn̄g pèi-chiah, chha-put-toh sī nn̄g pèi-chiah ê toā-sè, chhin-chhin chi̍t-tang koh-chhin chi̍t-tang ê chu-kim choán-chêng, chiap-cheng chi̍t-tang koh-chhin chi̍t-tang ê chu-kim choán-chêng, chhin-chhin.

question: Tī chit ê phiau ké (table) tiong, lóng-chóng ê 'pro-forma net loss' tī saⁿ tang (years) lóng-chóng sīnn-choa̍h (accumulated) ke cheng (how much)?
Kui-ê nî 'chheng-kòng' kah 'chò-chhiūⁿ' ê ki-chún kah jīm-chú hū-chè sún-sit/kó͘-chi̍p ê chha-ê sió-chió-pái ê sí?
Jit-chiàu "sio̍k-bûn jîn-chôa chè-kim cheng-chāi" chòe chē-chē chi̍t-pō͘-hun ê "hō͘-chòe sún-sit" tī 2001 nî ê phìn-tō͘ ū cheng-chāi?
Koh chiat-liân, chià-koh ū chi̍t ê 'net loss as reported' pí $400,000 koh-khah tuā, tān-sī 'pro-forma net loss' koh-khah sió koán $600,000?
In which year did the pro-forma net loss grow by the largest absolute amount compared to the previous year?
Nāi 2000 nî ê 'sio̍k kian-tāi ê jîn-lī chhiok-chêng chiàⁿ-chí' nā siâⁿ 20% tōa, hit nî ê 'tōa-chân bōe chhit-sû net loss' chiâⁿ chōa-bán?
2002 nî, 'siong-tio̍h ê sit-sûn' kap 'pro-forma sit-sûn' nn̄g ê hāng-bo̍k, ū siáⁿ chi̍t ê ê sò͘-ba̍t ke-tōa?
Tùi chit ê su-liàu lâi kóng, chit kó͘ ê 'chún-chòe tit-chōa' kap 'kò͘-choán chhiúⁿ-lâng hū-chōe sió-hóe' tī sann-tang ê sî-kan lâi kóng, ū siáⁿ-chóng koan-hē?
answer: Chit nn̄g ê sū-hāng ū chi̍t ê tò-chhiúⁿ ê koan-hē. Chhiūⁿ án-ni, tùi 2000 nî kàu 2002 nî, 'chún-chòe tit-chōa' ê tōa-sè-thâu tōa-kúi, lâi kóng, 'kò͘-choán chhiúⁿ-lâng hū-chōe sió-hóe' ê siau-hòe ê sán-liōng thè-nn̄g. Che sī kóng, chhiūⁿ-chhiūⁿ chhiūⁿ-lâng ê sún-chōe tiâu-tōa, in ē-tàng kiám-chió kò͘-choán chhiúⁿ-lâng ê hū-chōe sió-hóe.

question: Tī ta̍k-ê nî-tāi, "pro-forma" siau-che̍k tùi "basic and diluted net loss per share" ê sîng-sîn ū sím-mih éng-hióng, kā "as reported" ê sò͘-jī lâi pí-kàu?
answer: Tī ta̍k-ê nî-tāi, "pro-forma" siau-che̍k lóng ē kò͘-tēng-ê kòng-kē sió-chi̍t ê sió-chi̍t ê sió-chi̍t ê "loss per share" ê tōa-sè. Chit-ê chioh-sī kóng, hō͘-iáⁿ ê tiám, chhin-chhiūⁿ chip-ku-seng chi-chí ê siong-chú, lóng ē sán-seng chi̍t ê koh-khah tōa ê sió-chi̍t ê sió-chi̍t ê sió-chi̍t ê "loss per share" ê sǹg-tiâu.

question: 2001 nî pò-kò ê chóng-thin sit-pái sī-gōa-chē?
